effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage two to five times in a row, raising the user's Speed and lowering the user's Defense by one stage each upon last hit.
effect_entries.short_effect: Boosts the user's Speed and lowers their Defense by one stage after inflicting damage two to five times in a row.
